quote_first: ANNA PETRESCU TOUCHED the button on the top of her bedside clock. It glowed
quote_last: Another four minutes and it would have woken her with the early morning news. But not today.
title: False Impression
author: Jeffrey Archer

title: A Set of Six
author: Joseph Conrad
